turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Way to go, amigo !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm gonna need a squad leader.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: C'mon...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Nah, I don't do that anymore...

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: You used to dance...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I said no. Want me to pull rank ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Well, excuse me, sir...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Hey, Diz...

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: What ?

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Planet P ? What kind of name is that ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: They ran out of names a long time ago in this part of the galaxy.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Diz, see what you can do.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: I'm on it !

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: What frequency ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: All bands.

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: Roughneck patrol to battle group... Roughneck patrol to battle group...

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: I bought the farm, didn't I, Johnny ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: No, you're gonna be alright, Diz !

turns.speaker: DIZZY
turns.text: It's alright 'cause I got to have you, Johnny...

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Johnny, people get hurt... people get killed in the Federal Service. If something happened to you I don't know what I would do...

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Who gave you this idea ? It's that teacher. What's his name ? You know the one I mean.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Good good, then it's all settled.

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: A year at Harvard and you'll  see this "Federal Service" is just menial training for inferior people so they can call themselves "citizens" and take airs for the rest of their lives.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Why did you go and do that ? He was all ready to go Zegema Beach !

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Teenagers !

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: ...CUT OFF !

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Johnny, why won't you change your mind ? Does citizenship mean so much to you ?

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Don't talk like that. Get yourself home as fast as you can.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: We'll all have dinner. I'll fix your favorite.

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Yeah ! We'll talk it out and have a good glass of wine ... and... well, we love you, son.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Oh, my, what's that ?

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Looks like rain.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: This time of the year...?

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: This came for you today. I presume on your request.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: A lot of my friends are doing Federal Service...

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Have you lost you lost your mind ? I'd rather take ten lashes in Public Square than see you ruin your life.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: It's aterm of service, not a career. I just want to get out on my own and see the Galaxy for a couple of years.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Mr. Rasczak.

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Rasczak... Silly name. There ought to be a law against using a school as a recruiting station !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: No, Mr. Rasczak doesn't do that at all. He sorta discourages you really.

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Good, because you're going to Harvard, and that's the end of it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm eighteen. It's my decision.

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Oh, is that how it is ?

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: A trip to the Outer Rings. Whad'ya think of that ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Wow ! Santori and Zegema Beach, I've always wanted to go there.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Wait a minute ! Carl is doing his Federal and he isn't inferior. He's the smartest kid at school !

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Sorry. Carl's a fine boy...

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: You'll resign, and that's all there is to it. It might look bad, but if that's the worst you suffer...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I won't quit !

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: I'm telling you, you will ! You're not going back. You're going to go on vacation !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm not going on vacation ! I want to be acitizen ! It's my decision. I made it.

turns.speaker: FATHER
turns.text: Well, it's just good to hear from you. What's up, son ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: It's not really working out for me here, dad. I was thinking... I was hoping it would be alright if I came home.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: We must be right over the colony. Let's get some air support, eh ?

turns.speaker: GILLESPIE
turns.text: Yes, sir ! Fleet, this is Roughneck patrol, over ...?

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Corporal, I want pulse cannons there and there ! Rifle teams, spread out along the ridge ! Sugar, bring up that flame thrower !

turns.speaker: GILLESPIE
turns.text: Fleet's pulling the battle group back to safe distance... They'd like us to knock out those batteries, sir.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: They'd rather spend our lives than risk their ships. Who's got the nuke ?

turns.speaker: GILLESPIE
turns.text: I don't understand it, Lieutenant. It's not getting anything from 4th Brigade... not even their transponder.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Keep trying, Sergeant.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Gillespie, put in call for retrieval. We're off this rock. Gillespie, do you read me ?

turns.speaker: GILLESPIE
turns.text: AAAAAAAAAAA !

turns.speaker: INTELLIGENCE OFFICER
turns.text: At 0821 we received a distress call from Planet P, priority code, requesting reinforcement...

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: I thought 4th brigade cleaned out P.

turns.speaker: INTELLIGENCE OFFICER
turns.text: Owen reported the eradication of a low generation colony a month ago. That's why MICOM wants onsite assessment.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Sounds more like some idiot at Military Intelligence Command wants to get me and my cap troopers killed...

turns.speaker: INTELLIGENCE OFFICER
turns.text: Take your group down to P and have a look see. Leave the thinking to us, Lieutenant. That's not your job.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: My job is to protect the lives of my soldiers so they can kill bugs, Major, and if you're walking me into a trap-

turns.speaker: INTELLIGENCE OFFICER
turns.text: Bugs don't lay traps... They aren't intelligent ! Unlike you, they're stupid enough to follow orders !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Seeing as how we're about all that's left of  1st Brigade, you'd have to call that an improvement.  You top kick ?

turns.speaker: SUGAR WATKINS
turns.text: Are you kidding ? They always get killed. You want the job ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I wouldn't mind.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I always wanted to go to Zegema Beach.

turns.speaker: SUGAR WATKINS
turns.text: Good luck. It's not there anymore.

turns.speaker: SUGAR WATKINS
turns.text: You knew the Lieutenant before the war... What was he like ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: He was a teacher , kind of a know it all... Always had this little smile.

turns.speaker: SUGAR WATKINS
turns.text: Geez, I don't think I've ever seen him smile.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Must fill your bottle up real quick when your wife and kids get smeared.

turns.speaker: ZIM
turns.text: Smith, GO ! McIntire, GO ! Flores, GO ! Rico, I'm making you sqaud leader !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Sir, thank you, sir !

turns.speaker: ZIM
turns.text: Don't stand there dumb... GO !

turns.speaker: ZIM
turns.text: The Marauder power suit will prevent serious injury, but if you are hit, you will be non-operational and your team score will suffer accordingly. Rico, has each member of your squad completed a weapons safety check ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Sir, yes, sir !

turns.speaker: ZIM
turns.text: Is that your signature, Rico ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Sir, yes it is, sir.

turns.speaker: ZIM
turns.text: Doesn't look like it to me.

turns.speaker: PSYCH OFFICER
turns.text: No talking please. I'm going to ask you some questions. Please answer all questions truthfully. We'll know if you don't. Birthplace ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Here in Buenos Aires.

turns.speaker: PSYCH OFFICER
turns.text: Are your parents currently citizens ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: No, sir.

turns.speaker: PSYCH OFFICER
turns.text: Which do you think is more important, courage or confidence ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Courage, I guess.

turns.speaker: PSYCH OFFICER
turns.text: Please complete this sentence. I want to be citizen because...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I want to be a citizen because... well, because of my girl, sir.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Who said you could grow up so fast ? Last time I checked you were only five years old. You had such a bright little face...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Aw, don't get mushy.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Wait you two. Dad and I have a surprise for you that will settle this. Can you guess what it is ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Uh, no.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I don't know what they teach at Harvard, but I think I'm pretty good enough the way I am !

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Johnny, please. Calm yourself.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, that's what you're saying ! You're saying that I'm not good enough the way I am now !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, yeah, sure...

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: I hope so. I hope you don't ruin your life over some silly little girl who wants to look handsome in a uniform.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Hello... Oh, Johnny...!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Hi, mom.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Bill... pick up... it's Johnny ! You little rat. You haven't called, you haven't written. It's been so lonely here without you...

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Well, of course you should come home immedietly !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I've made a mess of things. I've been so stupid...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Don't get any ideas. She's my girl.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: You can never be sure.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Best in the Fleet !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I get it. This is the part that's best for both of us. Don't do me anymore favors, eh ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You got something to say about the Mobile Infantery ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: You heard me. Wanna make something out of it, private ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Not with an officer, no, sir. The M.I. doesn't mint stupid cap troopers.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: On whose authority, Corporal ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: This would be mine, sir. Acting Sergeant John Rico. I've assumed command on this mission.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You're standing on my H.Q., Lieutenant !

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: This is a Fleet-driven operation, son, and the Fleet thinks my boat will be safer on the high ground. You can have everything else, eh ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: You heard the Sky Marshall... Move it all down -

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Rodger Young, prepare to receice outgoing fire...!  I'll take the first group.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Saddle up, boys, that's our trash !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What's your problem now, Lieutenant ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: The Rodger Young just burned up...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: We're outa here. Lieutenant, get your men into the skimmers. This real estate's about to go buggy.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Hey, just calm down, I'm giving the orders here-

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: What do you think you're doing ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm gonna save Carmen.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: That would mean a comlete disregard for the mission objective. They hang you for that, Rico.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Let's go.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Move out.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Can you walk ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Not a problem.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Let's get some armor on her, and the we'll get outa this stinkin bug hole !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: How bad are you, pal ?

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Been better, buddy.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Alright, we're gonna carry you...

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: Nah, I figureyou folks oughta get upstairs before it's too late... Gimmee the nuke.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Don't be a hero...

turns.speaker: ZANDER
turns.text: This is my farm. Now c'mon, give me what you got and get out of here...

turns.speaker: RODGER YOUNG
turns.text: This is Rodger Young... What's going on down there ? We're taking plasma ! We have Orion P-11 as clear !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: SHUT UP, SIR ! We need pick up now !

turns.speaker: RODGER YOUNG
turns.text: What is your position ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Landing zone is extremely hostile. Come down on this transmission !

turns.speaker: RODGER YOUNG
turns.text: Inside 4th brigade compound ? That's crazy !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Then I hope you have a crazy pilot ! Keep the line open, Dizzy !

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: You. Tell me the moral difference, if any, between the citizen and the civilian ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: The difference lies in the field of civic virtue. A citizen accepts personal responsibility for the safety of the body politic, of which he is a member, defending it, if need be, with his life. The civilian does not.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: The exact words of the text. But do you understand it ? Do you believe it ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Uh, I don't know.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Of course you don't. I doubt if any of you here would recognize 'civic virtue' if it bit you in the ass.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Mister Rasczak ?

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: What is it, Rico ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I just wanted to say thanks 'cause History and Moral Philosophy was the best class I had this year.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Well, it's not really my job to please. Hope you learned something.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I wanna join up, Mr. Rasczak. I think I have what it take to be a citizen.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Good for you. Go find out.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Well, my parents are against it, and I know it's my choice, but I was wondering... What would you do if you were me ?

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Figuring things out for yourself is the only freedom anyone really has. Use that freedom. Make your own choice, Rico.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Where'd you learn to do that, soldier ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Uni High Tigers, sir. Don't you remember ? I was captain of the team.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: I'm not interested in nostalgia, Rico, I need a corporal. You're it until you're dead or I find someone better.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: All dead except one, sir.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Kill the bitch.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yes, sir.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Yopu asked me some advice once, Rico. Want some now ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yes, sir...

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Never pass up a good thing, eh ?

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Corporal, the Roughnecks are moving out for Planet P immediately. Get yourself squared away and report to Gillespie for logistics.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yes, sir !

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Who's that with you ?

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Rico, you're acting Sergeant now. My last Sergeant lost the com pack. Put together a search team and find the radio shack. We need retrieval.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yes, sir.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: What's that look like to you, Rico ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Looks like a bug was in his brain, sir.

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Warm it all up ! Everything you got ! Levy, collect the big guns from the towers. Watkins, put General Owen with the wounded. Rico, where's my communications ?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: What's going on, Diz ?

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Sergeant, secure the boat !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Yes, sir !

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: AAAAAAAAAAAA !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Cover us, Ace !

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Hit your jets, sir !

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: I can't My legs are gone... Get on the boat...

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: Rico, tell'em to glass this goddam planet. I've never seen so many bugs upstairs at the same time...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: We're not leaving you here, sir !

turns.speaker: RASCZAK
turns.text: This is my farm. Get on the boat, NOW ! That's an order, Sergeant.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Give'em hell, sir !

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Who is...'V'ger'...?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: V'ger is that which programmed me.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Is V'ger the Captain of the alien vessel?

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Where is Lt. Ilia?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: That unit no longer functions. I have been given its form to more readily communicate with the carbon-based units infesting Enterprise.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Why does V'ger travel to the third planet of the solar system directly ahead?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: V'ger travels to the third planet to find the Creator.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Find the Creator? <U>What</U> Creator? <U>Whose</U>...!?  What does V'ger want of the 'Creator'... ?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: To join with him.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: The Creator is that which created V'ger.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Who is V'ger?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: V'ger is that which seeks the Creator.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: The examination is a normal function.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: You may proceede.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: The carbon-units infection will now be removed from the Creator's planet.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: <U>Why</U>?!

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: The Creator has not answered.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: The carbon-units are not responsible for that.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: You infest and control Enterprise. V'ger believes carbon-units interfere with the Creator in the same manner.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: Disclose the information.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Not until V'ger withdraws the devices orbiting the third planet.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: KIRK UNIT! DISCLOSE THE INFORMATION!

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: Kirk-unit, <U>why</U> do you not disclose information?

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Because V'ger is going to destroy all the carbon units on the third planet.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: They have repressed the Creator.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: The information will not be disclosed.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Then V'ger must withdraw its orbiting devices.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: V'ger will comply if the carbon units disclose the information.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Our data is being prepared.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: <U>Answer</U>!

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: We will answer and present <U>proof</U> of our answer when it is ready!

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: The crews of the previous Enterprises were also carbon units. In what way is the life form in your vessel different?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: Carbon units are not true life forms... Do those images repre- sent how Enterprise has evolved into its present form?

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: Carbon units have clearly retarded Enterprise's proper evolvement.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: What is Enterprise's proper evolvement?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: Enterprise should not require the presence of carbon units.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: Enterprise would be unable to function <U>without</U> carbon units.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: More data concerning this functioning is necessary before carbon units can be patterned for data storage.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: What does that mean?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: When my examination is complete, the carbon units will be reduced to data patterns.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: Within you are memory patterns of a carbon unit. If I can help you revive these patterns; you could understand our functions better.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: That is logical. You may procede.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: Does V'ger object to the presence of the two carbon units?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: The carbon units are of no consequence; V'ger will determine their purpose.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: You said V'ger's purpose was to find and join with the Creator.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: That is how V'ger will survive.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: A machine...! Then it had to be programmed. By <U>whom</U>...?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: By the Creator.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: To join, and become One with the Creator?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: To learn all that is learnable; to deliver all collected data to the Creator on the third planet. That is the programming.

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: As I stated, V'ger calls to the Creator.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: V'ger is announcing that it has arrived, sir -- that it's ready to deliver the information it was programmed to collect...

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: 'To learn all that is learnable.'

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: It expects a return signal now, ordering it to transmit that information to the Creator.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: And when V'ger melds? What will happen to you?

turns.speaker: "ILIA"
turns.text: It will... take me from <U>you</U>...

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Departure angle on viewer.

turns.speaker: CHEKOV
turns.text: Departure angle.

turns.speaker: CHEKOV
turns.text: It is a courier, Captain. Grade One priority. Non-belligerency confirmed.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Very well, Mr. Chekov, see to it. Viewer off.

turns.speaker: CHEKOV
turns.text: Deck four, Captain; Officers' Quarters...!

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Have a security team meet me at Deck Four main elevator!

turns.speaker: CHEKOV
turns.text: Sir! Airlock four has been opened; a thruster suit is reported missing!

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Spock...!  Get a fix on his position!

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Mr. Chekov, when do those devices activate?

turns.speaker: CHEKOV
turns.text: They reach final position in... Twenty-seven minutes -- mark.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Engineering...

turns.speaker: CHEKOV
turns.text: Tractor beam strength lessening, Captain.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Mr. Scott... on my next signal.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: I'm taking over the Center seat. I'm sorry, Will.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: You are what...?

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: I'm replacing you as Captain of the Enterprise.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: You'll stay aboard as Executive Officer... a temporary grade reduction to Commander.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: -- You, personally, are assuming command?

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: May I ask Why?

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: My experience -- five years out there dealing with unknowns like this -- my familiarity with the Enterprise, this crew...

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: Admiral, this is an almost totally new enterprise. You don't know her a tenth as well as I do.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: That's why you're staying aboard. I'm sorry, Will.

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: No, Admiral. I don't think you are; not one damned bit. I remember when you recommended me for this command. You told me how envious you were, and if only you could find a way to get a starship command again. Well, sir, it looks like you found a way.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: We'll have to replace Commander Sonak. I'd still like a Vulcan there, if possible...

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: None available, Captain. There's no one in fact, who's fully rated on this design.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: You are, Mister Decker. I'm afraid you'll have to double as Science Officer.

turns.speaker: KIRK
turns.text: Programming ready?

turns.speaker: DECKER
turns.text: Program set for standard Warp entry, Captain...
